Finland: or <ref group=note>The yellow sign is used for local bus traffic and the blue one for long-distance bus traffic.</ref>
Netherlands: or <ref group=note>In the Netherlands  the first one is always used because otherwise it wouldn't be an official bus stop. The bottom one is sometimes used to inform drivers a bus stop is coming up  mostly outside the built-up area.</ref>

Italy: or <ref group=note>The background is green on motorway  blue on other road</ref>
Switzerland & Liechtenstein: <ref group=note>This sign (no. 4.07) is produced at the beginning of a tunnel; if accompanied with sign no. 5.03 (length indication)  it indicates the length of the tunnel  not the distance to the tunnel  as done by sign no. 4.07'a'!</ref><ref></ref>
